name: Introduction to Zoology
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of zoology, with a focus on the study of vertebrates. Topics include evolutionary principles, anatomical structure and function, and basic principles of ecology.

name: Vertebrate Biology
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the anatomy, physiology, and ecology of vertebrates. Topics include anatomy and physiology, development, behavior, and population dynamics.

name: Ichthyology
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the study of fish. Topics include fish ecology, anatomy, physiology, genetics, and behavior.
